participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and affectionate, loves spending time with her dog and enjoys thrilling stories.
participant_1.background: I have a secret tattoo that my dad would hate. I'm single. I have a baby monitor to keep an eye on my little one. I like reading horror novels. I have a golden retriever.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and sociable, enjoys cooking and has a sweet tooth for chocolate.
participant_2.background: I love my husband's cooking, but I'm a sucker for a good piece of chocolate. I read to relax and clear my head. I am hoping to move to Australia soon to marry my boyfriend. I do not like waking up early. I moved out when I was 14.

content.text: Just got back from the library.
I've been reading a lot of horror novels.
Oh really? That's cool. I love horror movies.
Me too! I used to be scared of everything when I was a kid but now I just love the adrenaline rush.
Yeah it's so much fun. I have a golden retriever.
Oh I love dogs! What's his name?
His name is Bear. He's the best dog in the world.
I bet he is! I love dogs. I have a cat but I wish I had a dog.
Well you can always come visit and play with Bear.
I would love to! Thanks for the offer.
No problem. Let's hang out sometime.
Sounds great! I'm free on Saturday.
Perfect! I'll bring Bear over and we can have a play date.
Sounds like fun! I'll see you then
